meanings.definition: A large earthworm used as bait in fishing.
meanings.sent1: I caught a big fish with a lobworm.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often use lobworms to catch fish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lobworm bring a fishing rod to the lake?
meanings.sent4: The lobworm wriggled like a dancer on the hook.
meanings.sent5: The lobworm squirmed in the dirt, tempting the fish.

meanings.definition: To fish using a lobworm as bait.
meanings.sent1: I will lobworm for trout this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He lobworms in the river every morning.
meanings.sent3: She lobwormed so much, she started speaking fish language.
meanings.sent4: The angler lobwormed with precision, luring the fish.
meanings.sent5: Lobworming requires patience and a steady hand.
